title: GraphQL Federation Test Fixtures Schema
description: Comprehensive fixtures for Apollo Federation v2 features including subgraph delegation, entity resolution, and federation directives (@key, @requires, @provides, @external)

entity_resolution_basic.name: entity_resolution_basic.json
entity_resolution_basic.description: Basic _entities query for Apollo Federation entity resolution
entity_resolution_basic.test_scenario: Simple entity lookup by ID via _entities query

entity_with_key.name: entity_with_key.json
entity_with_key.description: Entity with @key directive for federation subgraph key definition
entity_with_key.test_scenario: Resolve entity with single @key field and nested object

entity_with_compound_key.name: entity_with_compound_key.json
entity_with_compound_key.description: Entity with compound @key directive spanning multiple fields
entity_with_compound_key.test_scenario: Resolve entity using composite key (sku + category)

requires_directive.name: requires_directive.json
requires_directive.description: Field with @requires directive for dependent field resolution
requires_directive.test_scenario: Resolve computed field that requires access to other fields

provides_directive.name: provides_directive.json
provides_directive.description: Field with @provides directive for optimized nested field resolution
provides_directive.test_scenario: Resolve field with provided nested data for optimization

external_field.name: external_field.json
external_field.description: Reference to @external field used by @requires in another subgraph
external_field.test_scenario: Resolve computed field based on external (reference) fields

subgraph_introspection.name: subgraph_introspection.json
subgraph_introspection.description: Federation _service query returning subgraph Schema Definition Language
subgraph_introspection.test_scenario: Retrieve subgraph SDL for federation gateway composition

cross_subgraph_query.name: cross_subgraph_query.json
cross_subgraph_query.description: Query spanning multiple subgraphs with federation entity references
cross_subgraph_query.test_scenario: Query entities from multiple federated subgraphs with references

federation_error_missing_entity.name: federation_error_missing_entity.json
federation_error_missing_entity.description: Entity not found - returns null in _entities array per Apollo Federation spec
federation_error_missing_entity.error_scenario: Missing Entity (404 not returned, null in response)
federation_error_missing_entity.test_scenario: Request entity with non-existent ID returns null

federation_type_mismatch.name: federation_type_mismatch.json
federation_type_mismatch.description: Wrong __typename in entity representation - returns 400 error
federation_type_mismatch.test_scenario: Request with invalid __typename returns GraphQL error

@key.description: Designates an object type as an entity and defines the fields that uniquely identify it

@requires.description: Indicates that a field requires the presence of specific other fields in order to be resolved

@provides.description: Indicates that a field in one subgraph may return data that would be available from another subgraph

@external.description: Indicates that a field is defined and owned by another subgraph

_entities.description: Core federation query for resolving entities by their key representations

_service.description: Subgraph introspection query returning Schema Definition Language
_service.purpose: SDL retrieval for federation gateway composition and introspection

coverage_summary.apollo_federation_v2_compliance: Full coverage of core v2 features

usage_notes.testing: These fixtures support integration testing of Apollo Federation v2 implementations
usage_notes.gateway_composition: Fixtures demonstrate entity resolution patterns used by Apollo Federation Gateway
usage_notes.cross_language: All fixtures follow the standard spikard GraphQL fixture format for multi-language test generation
usage_notes.mock_resolvers: Each fixture includes resolver configuration for factory-based implementation
